'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{bow}}.

==Points of interest==
This is an underground dwelling carved out from the glacier, providing shelter from the icy winds that haunt the Dead Floe.

==Characters==
* [[Harbinger Brythe]]
